list_definition.definition: to throw into or through the air

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She tossed the ball up into the air.

list_definition.definition: (often with about) to throw oneself restlessly from side to side

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She tossed about all night, unable to sleep.

list_definition.definition: (of a ship) to be thrown about

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The boat tossed wildly in the rough sea.

list_definition.mean_english: tung đồng xu để đi đến phán xét
list_definition.definition: to throw (a coin) into the air and decide a matter according to (a correct guess about) which side falls uppermost

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They tossed a coin to decide which of them should go first.
The matter would be decided by the toss of a coin.
